MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Physics | b: Chemistry | c: Biology | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Photosynthesis | c: Cellular respiration | d: Genetics

MCQ: What allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce?
Choices: a: Energy processing | b: Genetic mutation | c: Cell division | d: Photosynthesis

MCQ: What is the study of life at the molecular level called?
Choices: a: Ecology | b: Genetics | c: Anatomy | d: Physiology

MCQ: When did life on Earth emerge?
Choices: a: 2.5 billion years ago | b: 4.2 billion years ago | c: 3.7 billion years ago | d: 5.0 billion years ago
